name: Cartpanda
headline: Global online sales platform
description:
As an ecommerce platform, we provide a complete ecosystem for creators and entrepreneurs to sell and promote their products and services, including tools for product management, affiliate management, payment processing and much more. Users can sell various types of products, including digital goods, services, events, and physical items.

Cartpanda help entrepreneurs scale their global sales by providing a high converting checkout page and payment solution, capable to convert to 180+ currencies and languages.

### Sell on the internet
## A robust infrastructure for your sales
![add a new product interface that includes the option to add physical and digital products ](https://framerusercontent.com/images/w8tWvNPHVpclDilwyYd0iDTDA28.png)
![add a new product interface that includes the option to add physical and digital products ](https://framerusercontent.com/images/w8tWvNPHVpclDilwyYd0iDTDA28.png)
![add a new product interface that includes the option to add physical and digital products ](https://framerusercontent.com/images/w8tWvNPHVpclDilwyYd0iDTDA28.png)
![add a new product interface that includes the option to add physical and digital products ](https://framerusercontent.com/images/w8tWvNPHVpclDilwyYd0iDTDA28.png)
### Sell physical and digital products
Unleash your creativity and sell both physical and digital products from just one platform, connecting your brand with consumers from all corners of the world.
![Payment table in the dashboard showing different payment methods and currencies](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VMyuXA89rDpqnu6t8qViNgunag.png)
![Payment table in the dashboard showing different payment methods and currencies](https://framerusercontent.com/images/m9XVGoJmnBrAtEOBDErVUT3qE.png)
![Payment table in the dashboard showing different payment methods and currencies](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VMyuXA89rDpqnu6t8qViNgunag.png)
![Payment table in the dashboard showing different payment methods and currencies](https://framerusercontent.com/images/VMyuXA89rDpqnu6t8qViNgunag.png)
### Simplify your back office
Take control of your business with a modern and user-friendly back office. Manage orders, payments, analytics, and more.
### The highest-converting checkout
Choose between the one-page or three-step model and sell with the highest-converting checkout in the market.
[Explore checkout](https://cartpanda.com/<./checkout/transparent-checkout>)
![cartpanda checkout on desktop](https://framerusercontent.com/images/mEEaCGsZZeiLDGyjYeWL7wF4CE.png)
![cartpanda checkout on desktop](https://framerusercontent.com/images/mEEaCGsZZeiLDGyjYeWL7wF4CE.png)
![cartpanda checkout on desktop](https://framerusercontent.com/images/mEEaCGsZZeiLDGyjYeWL7wF4CE.png)
![cartpanda checkout on desktop](https://framerusercontent.com/images/mEEaCGsZZeiLDGyjYeWL7wF4CE.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/i5jgNoaHn2VbfMAssFJc3NQRp5Q.png)
![interface de checkout cartpanda de marca](https://framerusercontent.com/images/tcVXCLAFTRbsUWsZpEFP5Lz8Y4.png)
![interface de checkout cartpanda de marca](https://framerusercontent.com/images/tcVXCLAFTRbsUWsZpEFP5Lz8Y4.png)
![interface de checkout cartpanda de marca](https://framerusercontent.com/images/tcVXCLAFTRbsUWsZpEFP5Lz8Y4.png)
### Checkout
## Reasons that make Cartpanda's checkout unparalleled
The most critical step in your sales funnel requires a high-conversion, multi-currency, and multi-language checkout. It was created with a clear goal: to boost your conversion rate. We've optimized every aspect of the checkout to ensure that your customer, no matter where they are, has a quick and easy shopping experience.
### The only fully customizable checkout
Online selling platform with customization of every aspect of the checkout to create a unique and visually stunning appearance
### Unmatched conversion rate
Transparent checkout that reduces customer objections and streamlines the purchasing process. Choose between one-page and three-step templates.
### Extremely fast loading
Fast-loading checkout, increasing your store's conversions and reducing customer drop-out.
### Earn more money with every sale.
Fully editable Order Bumps and Upsell Funnels are the perfect online sales tools to increase your store's average order value and revenue.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/8jRmNGnWmflH5nUHK8wXkNWXOo0.png)
### Global
# Easily sell to the whole world
# Easily sell to the whole world
# Easily sell to the whole world
# Easily sell to the whole world
Explore the world with Cartpanda and take your online business to the next level easily.
Sell ​​and receive payments in any currency directly into your account.
[Start now](https://cartpanda.com/<https:/accounts.cartpanda.com/register?ref=globalmeta>)
[Start now](https://cartpanda.com/<https:/accounts.cartpanda.com/register?ref=globalmeta>)
![ O mapa-múndi exibindo várias moedas, automaticamente convertidas para BRL e depositadas em uma conta brasileira.](https://framerusercontent.com/images/w6CxavIqtaqx5Tw8Jt2HVSDbEZE.png)
![ O mapa-múndi exibindo várias moedas, automaticamente convertidas para BRL e depositadas em uma conta brasileira.](https://framerusercontent.com/images/w6CxavIqtaqx5Tw8Jt2HVSDbEZE.png)
![ O mapa-múndi exibindo várias moedas, automaticamente convertidas para BRL e depositadas em uma conta brasileira.](https://framerusercontent.com/images/w6CxavIqtaqx5Tw8Jt2HVSDbEZE.png)
### Payments
## Local payments, globally
![stacked credit cards on top of each other](https://framerusercontent.com/images/SAXHDqhS3mpmAouuwLtHNpIrA.png)
![stacked credit cards on top of each other](https://framerusercontent.com/images/SAXHDqhS3mpmAouuwLtHNpIrA.png)
![stacked credit cards on top of each other](https://framerusercontent.com/images/SAXHDqhS3mpmAouuwLtHNpIrA.png)
![stacked credit cards on top of each other](https://framerusercontent.com/images/SAXHDqhS3mpmAouuwLtHNpIrA.png)
### Best approval rate
You need a platform that understand payments. Our multi-acquirer technology skyrockets your payment approval rates and ensures optimal performance.
![payment integration logos with cartpanda pay](https://framerusercontent.com/images/r64AqyerHsrGV91RrxD4KtibtY.png)
![payment integration logos with cartpanda pay](https://framerusercontent.com/images/r64AqyerHsrGV91RrxD4KtibtY.png)
![payment integration logos with cartpanda pay](https://framerusercontent.com/images/r64AqyerHsrGV91RrxD4KtibtY.png)
![payment integration logos with cartpanda pay](https://framerusercontent.com/images/r64AqyerHsrGV91RrxD4KtibtY.png)
### Collect payments anywhere in the world
Sell in over 135 currencies, without having to worry about conversions, integrations or anything else. Receive funds in your account in your local currency.
### Don't worry about fraud
We have a specialized anti-fraud system for our clients, focusing on maximizing approval rates without compromising the security. All you need to focus on, is making sales.
![revised payment list](https://framerusercontent.com/images/9UEYp9oDDtGx1NctBgj3sOsSqOc.png)
![revised payment list](https://framerusercontent.com/images/9UEYp9oDDtGx1NctBgj3sOsSqOc.png)
![revised payment list](https://framerusercontent.com/images/9UEYp9oDDtGx1NctBgj3sOsSqOc.png)

generated_description:
Cartpanda is a dynamic e-commerce platform launched in 2019 and based in São Paulo, Brazil. With a mission to empower creators and entrepreneurs, it offers a comprehensive online sales ecosystem for selling and promoting various products and services, from physical goods to digital assets, and even event tickets. 

Imagine an all-in-one solution where you can manage products, oversee affiliates, process payments, and access a variety of marketing tools—all aimed at helping businesses thrive on a global scale. That’s Cartpanda. 

As part of the Y Combinator Batch S21, Cartpanda provides robust features like a high-converting checkout page that supports over 180 currencies and languages, making it appealing to sellers aiming for international reach. Its user-friendly platform allows customers to seamlessly sell and receive payments, ensuring both ease of use and significant conversion rates.

With a talented team of about 60 employees and guided by Group Partner Aaron Epstein, Cartpanda is positioned to help users streamline operations with a modern back office for managing orders, payments, and analytics, thereby simplifying the selling process.

The platform is versatile, allowing entrepreneurs to diversify their offerings by selling everything from supplements to online courses. This flexibility is coupled with the assurance of top-notch security via an anti-fraud system, which lets users focus more on sales rather than worrying about potential issues.

So, if you’re looking to take your online business to new heights, whether you're an experienced seller or just getting started, check out Cartpanda's offerings at [cartpanda.com](https://cartpanda.com).
